name: obsidian-metatable
description: An Obsidian plugin to render the full frontmatter as a table.
author: Arnau Siches

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build && cp styles.css versions.json manifest.json dist && cp dist/styles.css dist/manifest.json dist/main.js '/Users/zhaihao/Documents/ORISON/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-metatable'
scripts.docs: npm run dist && cp dist/* docs/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-metatable && cp CHANGELOG.md docs/changelog.md
